text: Official administrative memorandum circulated to staff to coordinate changes to meeting schedules and ensure smooth internal communication between departments.
Surat rasmi pentadbiran daripada Pejabat Setiausaha Tetap bagi tujuan penyelarasan penjadualan mesyuarat dan komunikasi dalaman jabatan.
Internal administrative memo announcing the appointment of a new officer and outlining reporting lines for internal coordination purposes.
Memo dalaman pentadbiran yang memaklumkan pelantikan pegawai baharu serta aliran pelaporan bagi penyelarasan tugas dalaman.
Internal email notification sent to staff to inform and coordinate changes in daily office operating hours.
Emel pemberitahuan dalaman kepada semua kakitangan bagi memaklumkan dan menyelaraskan perubahan waktu operasi pejabat.
Meeting invitation email issued to departments for coordination and information sharing during an inter-departmental discussion.
Surat jemputan rasmi bagi tujuan penyelarasan dan perbincangan antara jabatan.
Official acknowledgment letter confirming receipt of submitted documents for administrative record-keeping.
Surat makluman rasmi kepada calon berkaitan keputusan permohonan kerja bagi tujuan pentadbiran sumber manusia.
Administrative circular issued to inform staff of updated internal communication procedures.
Pekeliling pentadbiran berkaitan penambahbaikan prosedur komunikasi dalaman jabatan.
Official notification letter informing staff of approved promotion and transfer for administrative record updates.
Surat pemakluman pertukaran dan kenaikan pangkat pegawai bagi tujuan rekod pentadbiran.
Internal reminder email requesting departments to submit monthly activity updates for administrative monitoring and coordination.
Peringatan dalaman mengenai penyerahan laporan bulanan bagi pemantauan dan penyelarasan pentadbiran.
Administrative circular outlining updated correspondence formatting standards for internal consistency.
Surat pekeliling pentadbiran mengenai penyeragaman format surat rasmi jabatan.
Official administrative letter notifying departments of a declared public holiday for operational planning.
Surat makluman rasmi mengenai pengisytiharan cuti umum bagi perancangan operasi jabatan.
Request for quotation detailing unit prices, total costs, and procurement specifications for office equipment acquisition.
Permintaan sebutharga rasmi yang menyatakan harga seunit, jumlah kos, dan spesifikasi perolehan peralatan pejabat.
Supplier invoice amounting to BND 4,850.00 received for ICT maintenance services and pending financial verification.
Invois pembekal berjumlah BND 4,850.00 diterima bagi tujuan pengesahan dan pemprosesan kewangan.
Quarterly budget report presenting expenditure figures, remaining allocation, and financial performance analysis.
Laporan bajet suku tahunan yang menyenaraikan perbelanjaan, baki peruntukan, dan analisis kewangan.
Formal submission requesting additional budget allocation of BND 25,000 for approved building maintenance expenses.
Permohonan rasmi peruntukan tambahan sebanyak BND 25,000 bagi kos penyelenggaraan bangunan yang diluluskan.
Payment authorization letter issued for settlement of supplier invoice totaling BND 12,300 following financial approval.
Surat kelulusan pembayaran invois pembekal berjumlah BND 12,300 selepas kelulusan kewangan.
Quotation comparison summary analyzing unit price differences to support procurement decision-making.
Ringkasan perbandingan sebutharga bagi menyokong keputusan perolehan komputer riba.
Financial statement outlining total project expenditure, approved budget limits, and remaining funds.
Penyata kewangan yang menyatakan jumlah perbelanjaan projek, had bajet diluluskan, dan baki kewangan.
Internal financial analysis memo reviewing departmental operating expenses for cost control purposes.
Memo analisis kewangan dalaman berkaitan kawalan perbelanjaan operasi jabatan.
Supplier registration form submitted for financial processing within the government procurement system.
Borang pendaftaran pembekal bagi tujuan pemprosesan kewangan dalam sistem perolehan kerajaan.
Tender pricing document specifying contract value, payment milestones, and financial obligations.
Dokumen harga tender yang menyenaraikan nilai kontrak, jadual pembayaran, dan obligasi kewangan.
Application form for renewal of business license.
Borang permohonan pembaharuan lesen perniagaan.
Form for applying staff travel allowance.
Borang tuntutan elaun perjalanan rasmi pegawai.
Application form for booking a government multipurpose hall.
Borang permohonan penggunaan dewan serbaguna kerajaan.
Form for financial assistance application for local students.
Borang permohonan bantuan kewangan bagi pelajar tempatan.
Application form for halal certification of local food products.
Borang permohonan sijil halal bagi produk makanan tempatan.
Official job application form for administrative positions.
Borang rasmi permohonan kerja bagi jawatan pentadbiran.
Leave application form submitted to Human Resource Division.
Borang permohonan cuti dihantar kepada Bahagian Sumber Manusia.
Online application confirmation for government aid programme.
Pengesahan permohonan dalam talian bagi program bantuan kerajaan.
Request form for government housing allocation.
Borang permohonan penempatan perumahan kerajaan.
Permit application form for organizing events in public areas.
Borang permohonan permit penganjuran acara di kawasan awam.
Policy circular issued to enforce updated data security requirements across government information systems.
Pekeliling dasar yang menguatkuasakan keperluan keselamatan data terkini bagi sistem kerajaan.
Official directive mandating proper handling and classification of confidential government documents.
Arahan rasmi yang mewajibkan pengendalian dan pengelasan dokumen sulit kerajaan.
Government guideline outlining mandatory rules for the use of official email accounts.
Garis panduan rasmi yang menetapkan peraturan wajib penggunaan akaun e-mel kerajaan.
Approved policy paper establishing flexible working arrangements for civil servants.
Dokumen dasar yang meluluskan pelaksanaan kerja fleksibel bagi penjawat awam.
Official policy memo introducing standardized meeting management procedures for compliance.
Memo dasar rasmi yang memperkenalkan tatacara pengurusan mesyuarat secara seragam.
Ministerial directive mandating the digitalisation of government services.
Arahan kementerian yang mewajibkan pendigitalan perkhidmatan kerajaan.
Policy circular enforcing staff code of ethics and professional conduct.
Pekeliling dasar yang menguatkuasakan tatakelakuan dan etika profesional kakitangan.
Guideline establishing mandatory procedures for public communication and media response.
Garis panduan yang menetapkan prosedur wajib komunikasi awam dan tindak balas media.
Official policy announcement confirming implementation of national environmental policy.
Pengumuman rasmi dasar mengenai pelaksanaan dasar alam sekitar negara.
Instruction letter directing agencies to comply with issued government circulars.
Surat arahan yang mewajibkan pematuhan terhadap pekeliling kerajaan.
